> It would be great if you could add the capability of using complex numbers in `uncertainties`. This is available in the Julia package, `Measurements`, but I would prefer to have this capability available in Python. Thank you for considering.
I spent so much time to add support for complex numbers to `Measurements.jl` and they prefer to use the Python package... :cry:  oh, no, wait, that came for free thanks to multiple dispatch, I spent exactly 0 seconds to make complex numbers work
